applyLiquidityDeltaToPosition(uint32,int.details: This function is called when anyone farms their liquidity. The position in a virtual pool should be changed accordingly

params.bottomTick: The bottom tick of a position
params.currentTick: The current tick in the main pool
params.liquidityDelta: The amount of liquidity in a position
params.topTick: The top tick of a position

cross(int24,bool).details: This function is called by the main pool when an initialized tick is crossed there. If the tick is also initialized in a virtual pool it should be crossed too

params.bottomTick: The bottom tick of a position
params.topTick: The top tick of a position

returns.innerSecondsSpentPerLiquidity: The seconds per liquidity inside the position

increaseCumulative(uint32).details: This function is called from the main pool before every swap To increase seconds per liquidity cumulative considering previous timestamp and liquidity. The liquidity is stored in a virtual pool

params.currentTimestamp: The timestamp of the current swap

returns._0: Status The status of virtual pool

getInnerSecondsPerLiquidity(int24,int24).notice: This function is used to calculate the seconds per liquidity inside a certain position
